website_summaries.verdict: An excellent starter pizza pan that will produce crispy crusts.
pros: Holes in bottom create crisp crust
cons: Some customers said the nonstick surface was too thin and scratched easily

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a non-stick pan that lasts
customer_reviews.text: Been going through bake (pizza) pans a lot in the last few years trying to find a good one. This model's a keeper. After a about 30 uses and 31 runs through the dishwasher, the coating's still intact, it stays clean, and the only rust is just a tiny bit from under the rim. Sadly, none of the other pans I've tried so far can make *any* of those claims. This pan has also remained smoke free. The perforations make for crisper crusts and firmer doughs. Just need a flat sheet under the whole thing if drippings are a concern. Since this pan has 3 "feet", it stays above the flat sheet so air can still circulate.
customer_reviews.author: John Locke

customer_reviews.title: Works great but warps with heat
customer_reviews.text: Update: I am having issues with this pizza pan warping. It twists almost 1/2 of an inch after baking. This says the metal may be too thin. It was NOT bent when I first started using it. Still works but I shouldn't have to worry about it warping. Wanted this size in the calphalon brand but they didnt have this size. Purchased this with fingers crossed. If you need a smaller size pizza pan this works. Cooks perfect and super easy to clean. Food slides right off without sticking
customer_reviews.author: Bellworx

customer_reviews.title: It has worked wonderful, but I can no longer get the Crisco ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the pizza pan for a few months.... It has worked wonderful, but I can no longer get the Crisco spray residue off even after I've soaked it for a lengthy amount of time in hot soapy water. I use a plastic pizza cutter and you can see every swipe I've made on the metal pan. Kinda thought it would have held up a bit longer as I only use it about twice a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dangel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan for making Pizza in my RV. I needed Airbake because the RV ovens do not cool properly. Airbake makes it all better, but especially when adding a pizza stone into the oven. I love this pan for its ease of use, easy to clean, and non-stick qualities. I would highly recommend this pizza pan, especially if you like a bit of a crunchy crust on your pizza. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Results in a good crust. Holes can cause a small mess.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan for pizzas. I used to use a cookie sheet, but that left a gooey crust. This pizza pan gives a crust that is just right (when I take it out of the oven at the right time...) The only thing I gave it only 4 stars for is the mess that can be made because of the holes. I still need to figure out where to place it after taking it out of the oven without allowing melted cheese or flakes of crust to fall onto the counter, stove top, or table. Overall, it does the job and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Automatic crispy crust!
customer_reviews.text: For such a low price, it gave us instant crispy pizza crust. We’ve just started experimenting with pizza making, and didn’t want to spend a lot, but wanted to try a pan with holes. It worked! Nice crispy crust! Perfect. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Buy, Home Run Inn pizza.
customer_reviews.text: This AirBake pizza pan works just as I needed it to. The typical store-bought pizza that I get from the freezer section, fits this pan very well. I go with Home Run Inn pizza. I'd definitely recommend this product to family and friends. Have a great day.
customer_reviews.author: MegaDave

customer_reviews.title: Made for Digorno pizzas!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for Digorno pizzas that want me to put the pizza on the open over rack, but my wife gets mad when cheese falls to the over floor. Now we are both happy. The pizza crust gets toasted, there is no clean up on the pan nor the oven. I do spray the pan with Pam non stick stray and I cut the pizza on the Digorno box as not to scratch this. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Knight

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal - I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The pizza comes out nice & it's a breeze to clean it. I would highly recommend it. I use it for heating frozen pizza
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza pan very sturdy cleans easy. Not only can you cook pizza also cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: 4 star only because it came with a scratch on it
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best pizza pan ever!!!! The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because it came with a scratch on it. The original one of these I’ve owned since the 90’s and it’s still good. These air bake products added amazing!!!! Absolutely AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: JBRighter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Pizza AND 10" steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Used mostly to hold 10" bamboo steamer over large pot. Its the perfect size to fit over large stock pots and the holes are the perfect diameter to fit within a 10" steamer. Very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pan, it is extremely easy to clean, I would not cut the pizza on it for fear of scratching the pan...pizza cooks up great!!! No soggy crust!!
customer_reviews.author: Gigles

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for RVers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pan to use in our travel trailer. It's fantastic. We got it yesterday and cooked a pizza and then tonight some French fries. Both turned out wonderful. We can now look forward to a more varied and tasty menu. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen s zielie

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: easy to clean, use and store. i think it does great job cooking a simple pizza. we're pleased w/ the product.
customer_reviews.author: LISA G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but misleading on dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. One thing though. It says it’s dishwasher safe. Then it says dishwasher detergent will cause discoloration. Otherwise it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Fish

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and sturdy. Even Tastes great! The pizzas aren’t all that bad either!
customer_reviews.author: Hank& Jess

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Heats evenly and no gucky cheese clean up. Really good for heating rolls and other baked goods. Sent a larger one to our son and he hates the holes. Go figure. If the holes are a problem, just put down a piece of foil, but we got this for pizza and it is just great.
customer_reviews.author: mr lucky

customer_reviews.title: this is a smaller pan which is fine for making a smaller size pizza
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sort of by mistake, I thought it was the bigger pan, this is a smaller pan which is fine for making a smaller size pizza. Great non-stick surface and easy to clean. The bigger pan is better though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Pizza on the Grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Have been cooking pizzas on the grill, but always had burned crusts. Not any more—they're now perfect!
customer_reviews.author: cleanjohnny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent strong pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is wonderful. It's strong and has the holes in it to make the pizza crisp.
customer_reviews.author: A Little ol' gal from "Jaw-Ja"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i lovet ,i have quilty pizza when i use theairbake
customer_reviews.author: adel rida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pans for anything in oven that won't drip through. The perfectly crisped crust on pizza!
customer_reviews.author: mama1

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a single friend so she can ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a single friend so she can cook smaller pizzas. She loves it. It is a little difficult to clean since it has holes in it, but it allows smaller pizzas to cook more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: jzaz

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I recently purchased this product, received it with a slight bend from one side. Overall product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Neha

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this once and the non-stick surface is already pealing off the pan and starting to rust. Don't bother with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bent Pan
customer_reviews.text: Pan was bent upon arrival and wouldn't lay flat. I bent it to reshape it the best that I could. Not worth sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Luv My Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Your pizza must-have
customer_reviews.text: Must-have for properly baking or heating up pizza (and other foods) in a toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza pans.
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the large pizza pan. Great for frozen and raw pizza cooking. Easy clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: lady turtle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its really nice but rather too expensive the shipping charge
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to get the large size now. What quality!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I spray it with a little olive oil and haven't had any problems with dough sticking to the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J. Guess

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: Non-stick surface I great. Pan makes a nice crispy crust. The only drawback is that if you cut the pizza on the pan, like I have done with every other pan I've owned, the holes in the pan make a mess on the counter. It's really not a big deal. Otherwise it seems like a good pan.
customer_reviews.author: BLS

customer_reviews.title: Pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: I liked, can't wait to use it ... would recommend. Seems to be made really well
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: This pan has a good weight, a great finish and makes a great ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan has a good weight, a great finish and makes a great pizza. Very easy to clean. Highly reci
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the oven clean, and pizza crisp
customer_reviews.text: The frozen pizza directions said to place the frozen pizza directly on the oven rack. What a mess! With this pan, the oven is clean and you follow the same times that come with the pizza. The pan is non-stick, so you slide the pizza onto a cutting board and use your favorite cutter. I like adding my own toppings to stuffed crust cheese pizza. Turkey pepperoni or sausage is the best. A quick wipe with a damp cloth cleans the pan.
customer_reviews.author: FictionFan913

customer_reviews.title: Dough Falls Through Holes
customer_reviews.text: I make my own yeasted pizza dough, and while holes seem like a good idea to crisp the crust, I've found that the dough gets pushed through to the underside of the pan when I place the dough into the pan. This makes for a bit of a mess during baking, but the baked pizza still comes out okay. Maybe if you use commercial dough this would not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: CatDancer

customer_reviews.title: Bake more than pizza
customer_reviews.text: In addition to pizzas, I have used this pan to bake meat, cookies, fish and appetizers. Everything came out the same as it had on a typical baking sheet. There was no sticking and clean up with a sponge was very easy. This is a great pan, but the 12" dia. may be a limitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC
customer_reviews.text: Had two in the lighter metal. Not sure I would like the darker one. LOVE IT. Immediately ordered a second one. One thing, do not cut the pizza on it. Scratched it up pretty badly. Will move to a cutting board next time. Crispy crust and slid right off the pan, even the pieces of mozzarella that were melted on it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta G. M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the style of the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: This pan has small "feet" on the bottom. These make it impossible to turn the pan on the oven rack. Otherwise, the pan is a nice non-stick surface
customer_reviews.author: funforkindle

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Made pizza crispy on the bottom 🍕
customer_reviews.text: Needed a smaller size for our new fifth wheel convection oven. This works great! Made pizza crispy on the bottom 🍕
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Caine

customer_reviews.title: Much better than cornbread on a wooden pizza baking board
customer_reviews.text: Our toaster oven pizzas have come out more even and easier to pick up and to clean. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Rusted out in 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in March, 9 months ago. Today it is rusted out. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: emeraldstar

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Works good but the bigger size is better for papa Murphy's pizza. I like it for tater tots and fish like the air holes
customer_reviews.author: LueAnn Franklin

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good pan. I don’t bake directly on it because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good pan. I don’t bake directly on it because I use aluminum foil. It really makes things cook faster, and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Nipper

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, the smooth curved up sides are perfect for sliding pizza off onto a cutting board
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Anne

customer_reviews.title: ... is a crisper that works - Performs not only great on pizza but we also use it on french ...
customer_reviews.text: If your are tired of "white bottom" pizza here is your solution - This is a crisper that works - Performs not only great on pizza but we also use it on french fries and frozen fish sticks .... if you have to eat frozen food this adds great crisp texture
customer_reviews.author: Markus Discus

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a friend. I'm told it works great and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Huey

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: Great Pan for Rv convection microwave oven. Food now comes out crisp...like frozen pizza. A bit on the high side for price...but well worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Love how it makes our homemade pizza turn out
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Love how it makes our homemade pizza turn out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pan for two people baking time was quick. Package directions say 30 minutes pizza was done in 15 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. This product should make some super tasting pizzas hot out of the oven
customer_reviews.author: mr x

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works well on my AirBake pizza pan--no scratching at all! It does exactly what I wanted it to do. It even cut through a very thin, crispy pre-made crust. I am delighted with it!
customer_reviews.author: Troy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Airbake pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pan I have purchased. I had one and another plain pizza pan and the perforated pan bakes much better so decided to purchase another one. Also the finish on this pan is really nice and the pizza doesn't stick like it does on my other pan. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan in my toaster oven ... provides a perfectly browned pizza crust.
customer_reviews.author: TMM

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard ripped off and resold
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Good price. I didn't like that the cardboard was ripped off by someone and returned and sold back to me. The price eases my anger a little though. It looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ament

customer_reviews.title: I love it! The pizza cooks fast
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The pizza cooks fast, even and fine..The pan prevents the sticky cheese from "sticking". No need to add spray or oil.
customer_reviews.author: CECILIA H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size for my extra large toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for my extra large toaster oven, and superior quality in the oven and dishwasher. No spotting or wear.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great pan! Pizzas bake evenly and the pan cleans ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pan! Pizzas bake evenly and the pan cleans up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: divertx

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice pan. We needed the smaller size and have already used it with success.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with how evenly this bakes my pizzas ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with how evenly this bakes my pizzas and I experimented and used it underneath pies I was baking. They came out evenly baked too-no burning! Clean up is fast!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Crisps without sticking
customer_reviews.text: Crisps pizza up great! Had it for about 3 months and it works like a charm. The nonstick and the perforations are fantastic, and I'm looking forward to making more pizzas with this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says, but a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: Great for non-stick, but this size is a little too small for standard frozen pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Stormfield

customer_reviews.title: Performed as stated but does not appear to be the ...
customer_reviews.text: Performed as stated but does not appear to be the laminated type but just a heavy pan with holes in it!!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us!
customer_reviews.text: This works well. You do have to adjust the oven temp for the darker pan. I was worried about using non non-stick tools on it, but it did not scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I wasn't sure about buying this but now I won't ever use anything else!!! This pan cooked the pizza evenly and to perfection! It also cooked the pizza in even less time than it normally takes!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cates

product_meta.title: AirBake Nonstick Pizza Pan, 12.75 in
product_meta.description: Size:12-3/4 in Dia| Color:GrayEven baking and browning. No burning. Will not rust. Made of two sheets of aluminum- the bottom sheet blocks the direct oven heat while the layer of air acts as an insulator preventing the top sheet from overheating.
feature_bullets: AirBake Nonstick Pizza Pan makes delicious, crispy, evenly cooked pizza
Surface is perforated to release moisture and allow the pizza crust to bake evenly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars232 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
